headline: 3 Americans Are Dead In Kenyan Base Attack
abstract: A service member and two contractors became the first American military-related deaths in Africa since 2018.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON â€” A United States service member and two American military contractors died on Sunday in an attack on a Kenyan military base that the Pentagon said was carried out by the Islamic extremist group the Shabab.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
